Rochester.Irondequoit Bay State Marine Park:
Irondequoit Bay State Marine Park is a 44-acre (0.18 km2) state park and boat launch located in Monroe County, New York, north of the City of Rochester. The park is operated by the Town of Irondqeuoit and primarily facilitates fishing and boating access to Irondequoit Bay and Lake Ontario.


== Park description ==
Irondequoit Bay State Marine Park includes space and facilities for fishing, boating, geocaching, kayaking, and canoeing.
